text:
Saatchi & Saatchi has engaged Sarah Chen to provide expertise for the Zimmermann Spring activation on behalf of Zimmermann. As consumers increasingly seek sustainable products, Australians are seeking better beauty solutions. As the campaign's subject matter expert, Sarah Chen will deliver key messages across media and social channels. This campaign reinforces the brand's leadership in beauty.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Zimmermann and the Influencer for Zimmermann Wellness Campaign 2026.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $11,167 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 1 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 3 months
- Exclusivity Period: 6 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 18 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Zimmermann retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.
labels: profile_Rexona _ WBD Foot Model Talent Agreement
